title: [Bug]: Cannot share my screen
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

I can't share my screen: when I try to do so a portion appears at the bottom of my display offering me to share the whole screen or specific windows. Clicking anywhere in this region does nothing. And the X at the top right of this region does nothing: the only way to get rid of it is to restart the app. Notice that I can share the MS Whiteboard with no problems.  This happening with both the Debian package and AppImage under Slackware 15.0.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.15 for the Debian package and 2.0.17 for AppImage.

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Just try to share your screen normally, as described above.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
My screen (or selected window) should be shared. It is not.
```
